Order.CustomerOrderNewNumberTemplate.description: This template will be used to generate the ID for a new Customer Order. Parameters: 0: Date and time (UTC) the ID was generated at, 1: Order ID

Order.ShipmentNewNumberTemplate.description: This template will be used to generate the ID for a new Shipment. Parameters: 0: Date and time (UTC) the ID was generated at, 1: Order ID
Order.ShipmentNewNumberTemplate.title: Order shipment ID template

Order.PaymentInNewNumberTemplate.description: This template will be used to generate the ID for a new incoming Payment. Parameters: 0: Date and time (UTC) the ID was generated at, 1: Order ID
Order.PaymentInNewNumberTemplate.title: Order payment ID template

Order.AdjustInventory.description: Adjusts the inventory when the order status changes

Order.LogOrderChanges.title: Log order changes
Order.LogOrderChanges.description: Logs order changes into the platform operation log

Order.Search.EventBasedIndexation.Enable.title: Enable event-based indexing for order entities
Order.Search.EventBasedIndexation.Enable.description: Any changes to the customer entity will trigger a background task that will apply these changes to the search index

Order.Validation.Enable.title: Validate order saving
Order.Validation.Enable.description: Enables validation of saving an order

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Indexa.title: Order indexing date and time

Order.OrderPaidAndOrderSentNotifications.description: Use order paid and order sent notifications

Order.PaymentShipmentStatusChangedNotifi.description: Use for payments/shipments status change notifications

VirtoCommerce.Orders.description: Export/import customer orders with all related objects (line items, shipments, payments, etc.)

CancelOrderEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when an order gets cancelled.

InvoiceEmailNotification.description: This is a template for customer order invoice used for generating PDF version

NewOrderStatusEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when the status of any order gets changed

OrderCreateEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification after submitting their details through a form in Storefront, e.g., through the Contact Us form

OrderPaidEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when all payments related to an order have been complete

OrderSentEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when all ordered items have been shipped

PaymentStatusChangedEmailNotification.description: The customer will receive an email notification with all changed payments statuses

ShipmentStatusChangedEmailNotification.description: The customer will receive an email notification with all changed shipments statuses
